data.title: BST Hyde Park
data.meta_description: BST Hyde Park returns on Saturday, June 29.
data.text:
American Express presents BST Hyde Park returns on Saturday 29 June to Sunday 14 July 2024.

The 2024 line-up:

SZA - Saturday 29 June.

Kings of Leon - Sunday 30 June.

Morgan Wallen - Thursday 4 July.

Andrea Bocelli - Friday 5 July.

Robbie Williams - Saturday 6 July.

Shania Twain - Sunday 7 July.

Stevie Nicks - Friday 12 July.

Kylie Minogue - Saturday 13 July.

Stray Kids - Sunday 14 July.

Tickets are available now from the BST Hyde Park website.

Entry timings: 14:00* - please note the gates will be open approx. 60 minutes early for those customers who select Primary Entry and VIP tickets.

*Gates for Andrea Bocelli on Friday 5 July will open at 15:00 for General Admission customers, and 14:00 for those customers who select Primary Early and VIP tickets.

Last entry for all shows - 20:30. The Box Office will close at 8pm. Please make sure you're onsite in advance of these times in case of queues.

All shows will finish by 22:30.

Getting to Hyde Park

All Hyde Park roads will close from 11am on concert days. The best way to travel to BST Hyde Park is via public transport.

See the map below for great routes to walk to the concerts from the local Underground stations.

Open House

Join us for Open House 2024. With free entry and an action packed programme of entertainment all in the heart of Hyde Park.

Dates: Friday 28 June - All Things Orchestral

Monday 1 July to Wednesday 3 July

Monday 8 July to Thursday 11 July

Local resident and business information

To safely host BST Hyde Park all park roads will close to vehicles from 11am on concert days.

Sound checks - sound check times are listed in the document below.

Sound line: the resident sound line and email address will operate throughout BST Hyde Park - 0300 061 2222 (for local resident and business calls only).
